text: 2022 in movies is a overview of events, including the highest-grossing movies, award ceremonies, critics' lists of the best movies of 2022, festivals, a list of country-specific lists of movies released, and notable deaths. Universal Pictures and Paramount Pictures celebrated their 110th anniversaries in 2022. ==Highest-grossing movies== Highest-grossing movies of 2022 Rank Title Distributor Worldwide gross 1 Avatar: The Way of Water Disney / 20th Century $2,320,250,281 2 Top Gun: Maverick Paramount $1,496,696,292 3 Jurassic World Dominion Universal $1,003,700,644 4 Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness Disney $955,775,804 5 Minions: The Rise of Gru Universal $940,628,210 6 Black Panther: Wakanda Forever Disney $859,208,836 7 The Batman Warner Bros. $770,962,583 8 Thor: Love and Thunder Disney $760,928,081 9 Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore Warner Bros. $626,571,697 10 Puss in Boots: The Last Wish Universal $485,252,376 * Category:Lists of movies
title: 2022 in movies
